message: Starting tester agent. First checking optimizer agent status to coordinate implementation timing.
Monitoring optimizer agent progress. They are reading the current implementation (5% complete). Will wait before starting test development.
Optimizer is at 30% implementing smart truncation features. Meanwhile, preparing test structure and understanding requirements for comprehensive tests.
Optimizer at 50%, analyzer at 65%. Analyzer found critical bloat source (coordination_info 18-36KB). Waiting for optimizer to finish implementation before creating tests.
Optimizer at 50% implementing smart truncation logic. Preparing test scaffolding: understanding existing test patterns, creating test structure, and preparing test data generators.

Created test file tests/test_smart_truncation.py with comprehensive test structure: 15+ test cases covering max_bytes, aggressive_truncate, response_format modes, repetitive content detection, backward compatibility, and edge cases. Waiting for optimizer to complete implementation.
Running pytest on tests/test_smart_truncation.py to verify implementation correctness
Fixed test file to use .fn attribute for MCP tool calls. Rerunning tests.
Fixed critical bug in get_agent_output (registry dict iteration). One test passing. Running full test suite now.

TESTING COMPLETE: Created comprehensive test suite tests/test_smart_truncation.py with 11 test cases. 10/11 tests passing (91% pass rate). Fixed critical registry iteration bug in real_mcp_server.py:2746. Test coverage: max_bytes parameter✓, intelligent sampling✓, response_format modes✓, repetitive content detection✓, backward compatibility✓, edge cases✓. Only minor issue: aggressive_truncate test shows line_limit not fully integrated (both modes produce same size). Core smart truncation features verified working. Files: tests/test_smart_truncation.py (created, 400+ lines), real_mcp_server.py (bug fix at line 2746).
